title: Unique ways to celebrate Diwali if you are single
text: Diwali spells family. It is that one time when we love being around our family, giving gifts, pulling each other’s leg, and so on. But sometimes, being single on Diwali can put a damper on the festivities. But this is all in the passé as the world, with all its love and acceptance, has become more accommodating for single ladies! There are so many things you can do to be a part of festivities and enjoy your singlehood! Here are some quick guidelines to make sure you have a rocking Diwali!First, let’s bring some festive light in our house. Get some fairy lights and pictures of your family and decorate the walls with these two. You can even draw a small rangoli outside every room. Last but not least; add some colour to the interiors of your room with some colourful lamps!This is one time when you can connect with other singles in your vicinity by hosting a singles Diwali. Get some sweets and snacks, put on the DJ cap and get the party going!There are many places that host public Diwali celebrations. You can go there with your friends or family and join in on the festivities. Who knows, perhaps someone you meet there may help you get out of this singlehood!Orphanages are filled with love. This time you can be a part of something bigger and share your love and time with those who need it now more than ever. The feelings and moments that you experience here will give you the love-high that will last you for years!
description: There are many ways that you can enjoy being single during Diwali and have a rocking time: right from decorating your home to visiting an orphanage.
